Document.Title: PHP 5.x Code: Building a SQL Format String for sprintf()

Content:
<?php        
    $sql = <<<BLOCK
SELECT
    `server`.`server_id`
,   `server`.`server_name`
,   `server`.`ip` 
,   `server`.`mac`
,   `server`.`sn`
,   server_status.status
,   `notes`
FROM
    `server`
,   server_status
WHERE
    `server`.status_id = server_status.status_id
AND
    `%1\$s` LIKE '%%%2\$s%%'
;
BLOCK;

    $s = sprintf($sql,'ip','10.');
?>
